metadata.description: Collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced AI-assisted development

plugins.name: reflect
plugins.description: Self-improvement system for Claude Code skills. Analyzes sessions for improvement signals, proposes skill enhancements, validates via critic agent, and tracks effectiveness metrics.

plugins.name: process-janitor
plugins.description: Safely detect and clean up leftover processes when multiple Claude Code instances are running. Multi-layer safety checks prevent false positives.

plugins.name: self-debugger
plugins.description: Meta-plugin that monitors, debugs, and improves all plugins by detecting issues, generating fixes, and committing them to feature branches. Auto-discovers patterns via web search and continuously self-improves.
